data.title: The Asian Palace  Had A Fire And Is Closed !!!
data.text: When the Asian Palace was open it was a sit down old style Chinese restaurant. The food was good and the service varied.  I enjoyed their noodles and duck sauce ant the spicy chinese mustard.  The wanton soup was one of my favorites and you could get  good chow mein there. The Chinese ribs were good as was the po po platter. Since the fire the place is shut down with no notice of when they will reopen.
